function RYU_EP04_16()
    -- .転-2【12月第3週】「保守派筆頭としての戦い」
    SaveData.Title = "保守派筆頭としての戦い"

    -- //BG：男子部校舎（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG021ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM03.wav")

    MSG([[ The night one week before the Princess Election. ]])

    MSG([[ When it was time to lock the boys' campus, all of us in the boys' division were heading home together. ]])

    -- //BU：オウガ（通常）、先輩たち（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAA01ma")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0111.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】
 “The Princess Election is soon, and it’s also winter break! How about we all go somewhere together?” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0083.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #2】
 “I agree! Let's all go out and have fun together!” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0116.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】
 “Sorry, but I have to head to the battlefield for four days starting from the end of the year... Count me out.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0381.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 “Speaking of which, the Rokujou family has a villa near <r=がろ>Garo</r> Hot Springs. Shall we all go there?” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1240.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Hot springs! Hot springs are great! I've wanted to visit Garo Hot Springs once, so I'd love to go.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    -- //BG：校舎前（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG011ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //BG：メインストリート（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG019ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ As we walked discussing the boys' winter break plans, we suddenly noticed someone familiar collapsed on the main street. ]])

STOP_BGM(2000)

    -- //BU：ウラン（悲しみ）
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01da")

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1241.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “U-Uran-san!?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0703.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “Ugh...” ]])


    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    MSG([[ We hurried over to check her condition. ]])

    MSG([[ Her whole body was soaked with sweat. She was trembling lightly, maybe from being cold, and her breathing was heavy. ]])

    MSG([[ She responded to my words, so I knew she was still conscious. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1242.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “I'll quickly go buy a warm drink! Could you please watch over Uran-san!?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //BU：オウガ（通常）、先輩たち（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,400,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)
    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAA01aa")
    --LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0382.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 “Calm down. I'll go buy the drink. Minato, watch over Ryuguuin’s condition.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0383.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】
 “If anyone but you touches Ryuguuin, she might reject them.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAA01ma")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-400,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)
PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0112.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】
 “Exactly! And I don’t think I can hold back!” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0084.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #2】
 “I’ll end up touching her!” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0117.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】
 “So... we’re gonna get towels from the security guard dude.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1243.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Thank you! Please take care of it!” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ With that, Ouga and the others left the spot. ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-600,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    -- //BU：ウラン・悲しみ
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_RYU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,0,-150)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav")

    -- //CI：145
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"CI145a")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ Left alone, I rested Uran-san’s head on my knee and wiped away her sweat as much as I could with my handkerchief. ]])

    MSG([[ When I touched her forehead, it felt like her normal temperature. That was a relief; it didn’t seem serious. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0704.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “E-Erika, san...?” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1244.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Uran-san.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Uran-san muttered words. She still seemed a bit unclear and mistook me for Erika. ]])

    MSG([[ To calm her, I spoke gently in Erika’s voice. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1245.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “They’re going to get a warm drink now, so please wait a little. But still, what happened to you?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0705.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “I’ve been doing a lot of running lately to build up my strength...” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0706.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “Maybe the fatigue built up more than I thought, and I got dizzy on the way home after changing...” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1246.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Heh, sounds a bit like someone from a while ago. Nobody's looking, so please rest for a bit.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ It surprised me that Uran-san kept running, but just like me back then, she pushed to the limit and collapsed from exhaustion. ]])

    MSG([[ I imagined how Akira would tease me mercilessly, calling us “kindred spirits,” and I chuckled to myself. ]])

    MSG([[ From an outsider’s perspective, I probably seem as reckless as Uran-san. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1247.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 (She hid her anxious feelings the whole time.) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ And I think that’s perfectly natural. ]])

    MSG([[ Even if Uran-san’s aikido skills are equal to Daria’s, the physical stamina gap can’t be bridged. ]])

    MSG([[ I’ve heard since before that Uran-san is physically weak, especially with her lungs. ]])

    MSG([[ As she’s collapsed now, if she overexerts herself and her breathing worsens, even walking would be tough for her. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1248.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Uran-san, it’s dangerous for you to face Daria-san in your current condition.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1249.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “If it’s okay... would you let me take your place? Originally, this Princess Election was planned for Daria-san and me.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1250.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “I can’t bear that you’d get hurt protecting me. I will replace you and try to defeat Daria-san.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0707.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “That can’t happen. This Princess Election... is also a atonement to you, to Erika-san.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1251.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Atonement to me...?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0708.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “Yes... I once suspected Erika-san of being part of the ‘Shadow Coeducational Faction.’” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0709.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “But the real identity was 'Princess' Daria-san, who was closest to me. I was foolish enough to doubt a dear friend while ignoring my own incompetence.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0710.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “To make amends to you, I have no choice but to defeat Daria-san. I want to be of service to Erika-san.” ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,-200,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    MSG([[ As she said this, Uran-san’s consciousness slipped away again. ]])

    MSG([[ Gently wiping the sweat from her forehead with my handkerchief, I regretted my own insensitivity. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1252.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 (Uran-san worked this hard because she felt indebted to me. I’m sorry I didn’t notice until today.) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ As her close friend, I couldn’t just disregard Uran-san’s feelings. ]])

    MSG([[ I decided to pretend I hadn’t heard and waited for Ouga and the others to return, still cradling Uran-san’s head in my lap. ]])

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RYU_EP04_17")
end
